interestingFact: India has the world’s largest democracy.
The U.S. has the world’s largest economy by nominal GDP.
Tokyo is one of the most populous metropolitan areas in the world.
Brazil is home to most of the Amazon rainforest.
Germany is known for its engineering and automobile industry.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
Canada has more lakes than any other country.
France is the most visited country in the world by tourists.
South Africa has three capital cities and 11 official languages.
Rome is home to Vatican City, the smallest country in the world.
